Welcome to Tehillim Groups

This simple web app allows you to create Tehillim groups and divide the book of Tehillim into equal sections for each member to pray. When everyone in your group has read their sections, together you will have completed the entire book of Tehillim.

For group leaders, it is simple to use, just put the number of people in your group and then assign a group code. The group code (or a link) can be given to the members of your group, so they can get their assigned chapters to pray.

Tehillim Group Leaders - Create a Tehillim Group

(Gruop code can only contain lowercase letter and no spaces)

Tehillim Group Members - Get Your assigned Tehillim

(Gruop code can only contain lowercase letter and no spaces)
